name: StarBoy (itch)
description: Its a 2d top down space shooter game made in Unity using C#.   Where your main objective Is to beat the score by destroying more enemy ships.  It is being made by taking references from online tutorials on how to make space shooter game.  Some of the art like planets and UI text has been done by me and other art is taken from online from royalty free websites. It was a solo project which took 2 months to make and was a learning experience for me to code a space game in unity .
